remarks: Derive axiom ~ ax-hvdistr1 from Hilbert space under ZF set theory. (Contributed by NM, 31-May-2008.)  (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
axhil.1 $e |- U = <. <. +h , .h >. , normh >. $.

axhvdistr1-zf $p |- ( ( A e. CC /\ B e. ~H /\ C e. ~H ) -> ( A .h ( B +h C ) ) = ( ( A .h B ) +h ( A .h C ) ) ) $.
